summary:
Immersive Water returns in a third version for a best game experience.
Skyrim (Vanilla) provides only one texture for every type of water, Immersive Water 3 is now composed of different textures for each type of water you will encounter in the game (Ocean, River, Creek, Marsh and Normal Water).
Also, the waterfalls and foam have new textures.
descriptionHtml:
[size=100][b][color=#68c1ff]Immersive Water 3.1[/color][/b][/size]



[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=41u_Uc8APH4&hd=1]See this video in HD and Full Screen on Youtube[/url]

[youtube]41u_Uc8APH4[/youtube]

-----------------------
Description
-----------------------
Immersive Water returns in a third version for a best game experience.
Skyrim (Vanilla) provides only one texture for every type of water, Immersive Water 3 is now composed of different textures for each type of water you will encounter in the game (Ocean, River, Creek, Marsh and Normal Water).
Also, the waterfalls and foam have new textures.

You can use [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=823]Immersive Environment mod[/url] for better water color.

-----------------------
Install
-----------------------
1. Extract the zip to your skyrim folder.
2. if prompted to merge or replace files/folders, click yes.
3. Activate the ImmersiveWater3.esp file in data file when you start Skyrim.

-----------------------
Uninstall
-----------------------
Delete the files.

-----------------------
Changelog
-----------------------
3.1
- New River water texture
- New foam water texture 

3.0
- 5 news textures for each type of water in Skyrim (Ocean, River, Creek, Marsh, normal water).
- 3 news textures for the waterfalls. 
- All textures are available in High Definition (2048*2048).

2.0
- New texture 
- Texture HD
- More waves
- Best fitting tiles
- Clearer water
- Better reflection

1.0
- First release

-----------------------------
Credits
-----------------------------
Immersive Water 3.1 by Gnozer

-----------------------------
My other mod
-----------------------------
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=823]Immersive Environment[/url]
author: Gnozer
